body: Unless otherwise stated, any reference to tier in a mythic spell description refers to the tier of the creature casting the spell. Whenever a mythic spell refers to half your tier, the minimum is 1 (meaning you still get a benefit at 1st tier).
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Spells/Tiers in Mythic Spell Descriptions
name: Tiers in Mythic Spell Descriptions
